name: Remove elements from a two-dimensional array
instruction:
The `doubleArray` function takes a two-dimensional array and a number.

You need to remove a given number of elements from each array from the beginning of the array and return the resulting two-dimensional array.

The number of subarrays is 2.

An example of a function with two subarrays:
```javascript
doubleArray([["a", "a", "a", "a", "a"], ["b", "b", "b", "b", "b"]], 2)
```

An example of running a function:
```javascript
doubleArray([["a", "b", "c", "d", "e"], ["f", "g", "h", "i", "j"]], 2) // [["c", "d", "e"], ["h", "i", "j"]]
doubleArray([[0, 0, 0, 0, 0], [1, 1]], 3) // [[0, 0], []]
```
